overview: "Because it wouldn't be the same without you, MARC DORCEL invites you to join in celebrating its anniversary with this 35 YEAR ENCYCLOPEDIA BOX SET. The French specialist in sex and lust has created the very first complete porn Encyclopedia just for you. It includes all sexual practices, the most exciting fantasies, the best directors, and, of course, the greatest porn stars from 1979 onwards. With nearly 3 hours of uninterrupted sex and 16 actresses from the best films of the DORCEL collection, relive 35 years of purely French pornography! The 35 YEAR ENCYCLOPEDIA BOX SET, Dorcel porn from A to Z."
title: Encyclopedia O-P-Q-R
